title: Compare Peter Great to Frederick Great goals, pol

content.question: Directions: The suggested writing and planning time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. Compare and contrast the goals and major policies of Peter the Great of Russia (ruled 1682-1725) with those of Frederick the Great of Prussia (ruled 1740-1786).

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
